thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: For some reason, I initially had a problem when creating an account, causing me to accidentally create two accounts (which made it impossible to buy). Contacted the customer service and they were very helpful! Once the problem is solved, I had no problem at all in buying here. Very fast and reliable. Although, until today I seem to have a problem when trying to log in using my phone (no problem if I use the laptop). All in all, a very good service!
